CustomField.description: Follow the naming convention! Year – Product(s)/Service(s) I.e. 2021 - AI Tax, 2021 - Analyze and Automate This will make it very easy to scan opportunities in reports and on account records.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Follow the naming convention! Year – Product(s)/Service(s) I.e. 2021 - AI Tax, 2021 - Analyze and Automate This will make it very easy to scan opportunities in reports and on account records.
